body: I'm surprised the difference is this minute... Not sure I'll be able to figure it out completely within our proposed timeline, but if you upload the two tarballs I'd be happy to investigate!

As of current master (on aarch64):

* `HOSTS="aarch64-linux-gnu" ./contrib/guix/guix-build` fails: 


* The others all pass
I now have some aarch64 hardware, so can help test / debug here. Will run some Guix builds shortly.
